class.name: MediaPipeTaskRunner
class.description: [MediaPipeTaskRunner] is a high-level class for running MediaPipe graphs. The task runner can run in either synchronous or asynchronous mode.

method.name: get_graph_config
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeGraphConfig] of the task runner.

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initializes the task runner with [param config]. Returns [code]true[/code] on success. If [param async] is true, the task runner will run in asynchronous mode, [method send] should be used instead of [method process] for processing packets input.

method.name: process
method.description: Processes the packet map [param inputs] in synchronous mode. This method blocks current thread until a result is returned.

method.name: restart
method.description: Resets and restarts the task runner.

method.name: send
method.description: Sends the packet map [param inputs] in asynchronous mode. Returns [code]true[/code] on success.

signal.name: error
signal.description: Emitted when the task runner has encountered an error.

signal.name: packets_callback
signal.description: Emitted when the task runner running in asynchronous mode has returned output [param packets] processed from [method send].
